msContents.summary: Tax register, recording day by day the collection of money taxes.

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Recto; some writing on the Verso
+ P.Cair. Inv. 57187; P.Iand. VII, 141; P.Mich. Inv. 2830; 3159; 4910

condition.ab: This light-brown papyrus is regularly cut at the right and the left. Kollesis in the center. (TC)

handDesc.p: Written in a quick but clear cursive. The scribe separated a new entry from the preceding one by underlining the name of the tax payer. Diairesis used occasionally. (TC)

origin.origPlace: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt
origin.persName: Aphrodisios, son of Onnophris, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Ptolema (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 157)
Gaius Valerius Chairemonianus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 160)
Gaius Sextus Priscus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 160)
Nekpheraus, son of Nekpherautos (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 190)
Phanomgeus, son of Phanomgeus, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Tapsais (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 245)
Ptolemaios, his brother with the same mother (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 219)
Petheus, son of Onnophris, a potter (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 202)
Heras, son of Petheus, grandson of Heras, mother Didymarion (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 169)
Heron, son of Petesouchos, grandson of Petesouchos, mother Tasoucharion (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 171)
Longinos alias Gemellus, fatherless, mother Taphois (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 185)
Hermation, slave of Isidoros alias Longinos (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 163)
Tamystha, daughter of Onnophris (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 233)
Karanos, son of Samanelai (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 180)
Apynchis, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Pakysis, mother Tasoucharion (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 154)
Aphrodous, daughter of Isidoros (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 158)
Julius Aphrodisios Belleketouis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 178)
Kalalas (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 180)
Phasis, son of Pakysis, grandson of Pakysis, mother Tanebkenis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 246)
Kommonis, daughter of Ammonios (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 183)
Aphrodisia, daughter of Apollodoros (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 157)
Ares, son of Ankis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 154)
Gaius Valerius Apolinarios (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 159)
Chairemon, son of Patis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 247)

provenance.p: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt

taxonomy.desc: APIS keywords are controlled locally at the institution level. They are not necessarily consistent.

keywords.term: Patsontis district; see also electronic version of P.Mich. IV, 224;

div.ab: "(Column) 75:;Aphrodisios, son of Onnophris, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Ptolema, drachmas 4 obols 28;;Gaius Valerius Chairemonianus;;(in left margin: naubion of katoikoi for the 13th year drachmas 2 obols 2, surcharges obol 1.5, kollybos obol 0.5, in total drachmas 2 obols 4;;and to Gaius Sextus Priscus;;naubion for the 13th year on land plots in release obols 3.5, surcharges obol 0.5 chalki 2, kollybos chalki 2;;and to Nekpheraus, son of Nekpherautos;;dove cote tax for the 13th year drachma 1, surcharges obol 0.5, in total drachma 1 obol 0.5;;Phanomgeus, son of Phanomgeus, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Tapsais, drachmas 4;;Ptolemaios, his brother with the same mother, drachmas 4;;Petheus, son of Onnophris, a potter, drachmas 32;;(in left margin: drachmas 32 obols 4) paid in potters' tax for the 13th year drachmas 30m surcharges drachmas 2, in total drachmas 32; ;Lucius Longinus Gemellus;;bath tax for the 13th year in alloy, drachmas 20;;Heras, son of Petheus, grandson of Heras, mother Didymarion, drachmas 4;;Heron, son of Petesouchos, grandson of Petesouchos, mother Tasoucharion, drachmas 4;;Longinos alias Gemellus, fatherless, mother Taphois, drachmas 12 copper tetradrachmas 4;;Hermation, slave of Isidoros alias Longinos, drachmas 12 copper tetradrachmas 4;;Tamystha, daughter of Onnophris (Karanos, son of Samanelai);;(in left margin: drachmas 28 obols 28) orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 6 obol 1.5, tax on the produce of olives obols 5.5, naubion obols 4, surcharges drachma 1 obols 3.5 chalki 2;;eparourion drachmas 4 obol 1, surcharges obols 2 chalki 2, kollybos obol 1.5, in total drachmas 14 obol 1.5;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 15 obols 3.5 chalki 2, surcharges drachma 1, in total drachmas 16 obols 3.5 chalki 2;;Apynchis, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Pakysis, mother Tasoucharion, drachmas 4;;in total for the day drachmas 156 obols 22.;(Pauni) 10 likewise:;Aphrodous, daughter of Isidoros through the agency of Julius Aphrodisios Belleketouis (through the agency of Kalalas);;orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 3 obols 4.5, tax on the produce of olives obols 5 chalki 2, naubion obols 2 chalki 2, surcharges drachma 1;;(in left margin: drachmas 20 obols 6) eparourion drachmas 2 obols 3, surcharges obol 1 chalki 2, kollybos obol 1, in total drachmas 8 obols 5 chalki 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 9 obols 2 chalki 2, surcharges obols 3.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 10;;naubion of katoikoi for the 13th year obols 5, surcharges obol 0.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 5.5 chalki 2;;Phasis, son of Pakysis, grandson of Pakysis, mother Tanebkenis, drachmas 8;;Kommonis, daughter of Ammonios together with Aphrodisia, daughter of Apollodoros;;(through the agency of Ares, son of Ankis);;(in left margin: drachmas 28 obols 10) orchard taxes for the 10th year apomoira drachmas 12 obols 5, tax on the produce of olives drachma 1 obols 5, naubion drachma 1 obol 1.5 chalki 2, surcharges drachmas 3 obol 1 chalki 2;;eparourion drachmas 8 obols 3 chalki 2, surcharges obols 4, kollybos obols 3, in total drachmas 28 obols 5 chalki 2;;Gaius Valerius Apolinarios (Chairemon, son of Patis);;orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachma 1 obols 5 chalki 2, tax on the produce of olives obol 1.5 chalki 2, naubion obol 1 chalki 2, surcharges obols 3;;eparourion drachma 1 obol 1.5, surcharges obol 0.5 chalki 2, kollybos obol 0.5, in total drachmas 4 obols 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 4 obols 4 chalki 2, surcharges obols 2, in total drachmas 5 chalki 2."

listBibl.bibl: Rep Editor - Pearl OM; Rep Ser. - Diss; 1938; pg. 9 - 10 Youtie HC, PMich IV, 1, 224, 1937 Pearl OM - Youtie HC, PMich IV, 357 C, D, 1939
